pullrequest.title: Create a Buggy plugin using ODE to demonstrate the buggyDemo

content.raw:
Note: I think this PR is probably somewhat on hold as we figure out whether we want to fork ODE or use the upstream version.

But if we want to move ahead with this work as being an illustrative prototype, we could merge it and then revise things later when we make the decision about how to handle ODE.

The upstream ODE dependency of this PR is optional anyhow, so merging this wouldn't really be a burden for anyone.
content.html:
Note: I think this PR is probably somewhat on hold as we figure out whether we want to fork ODE or use the upstream version.

But if we want to move ahead with this work as being an illustrative prototype, we could merge it and then revise things later when we make the decision about how to handle ODE.

The upstream ODE dependency of this PR is optional anyhow, so merging this wouldn't really be a burden for anyone.
